title: yoigo type?
content:
Hi everyone, I found this logo from a spanish mobile phone company so wanted to know whats this typography.

Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [yoigo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108182505/http:/typophile.com/files/yoigo.jpg) | 45.18 KB |
author: alectro

comments.content:
This would have been drawn especially for the logo, and is probably not a font. Look at how different the 'o's are from each other.

- Lex

Yes, I think maybe is a specially designed font.  
Thanks Lex!
